meanings.sent1: The group of rehabilitants worked hard in physical therapy.
meanings.sent2: The rehabilitants at the center are learning to walk again.
meanings.sent3: The rehabilitants had a race in wheelchairs for fun.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of the rehabilitants soared as they made progress.
meanings.sent5: The smiles on the faces of the rehabilitants showed their determination.

meanings.sent1: The rehabilitants gathered for a group session.
meanings.sent2: The team of rehabilitants supported each other through recovery.
meanings.sent3: The rehabilitants organized a bake sale to raise funds.
meanings.sent4: The community embraced the rehabilitants with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the rehabilitants inspired others in the facility.
